title: Super Bowl 2017 Patriots vs. Falcons score: Live blog, updates, inactives, highlights
text:
Super Bowl 2017 Patriots vs. Falcons score: Live blog, updates, inactives, highlights Super Bowl 2017 Patriots vs. Falcons score: Live blog, updates, inactives, highlights The Patriots are set to play their ninth Super Bowl while the Falcons are making just their second trip by Eye on Football staff 1h ago â€¢ 1 min read 
HOUSTON -- It's finally here. Game day. 
Of course, it's not just any game day, though. It's the New England Patriots and the Atlanta Falcons in Super Bowl LI on Sunday at NRG Stadium in Houston. It's Tom Brady , who's seeking his fifth Super Bowl ring, against Matt Ryan , recently crowned the NFL 's Most Valuable Player. 
Hope you stocked up on the snacks and are ready for a shootout. We'll keep you updated on everything happening before, during and after the Super Bowl in our live blog below. 
If the live blog below is not loading properly for you, please click here to view it . Add a comment
